location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 30 TO ILLUSTRATE THE OPERATIONS ABOUT THE KHALIS CANAL. 9th.-15th. April, 1917.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 169 x 190mm, on sheet 216 x 363mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume III, and shows a region around the Khalis Canal [Qanāt al Khāliş] in central and eastern Iraq, indicating military operations, towns, settlements, tracks, the route of a light railway and watercourses. There is some indication of vegetation.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1925.
